page.title: 05BIOGRAPHY
page.content: MISS READ WAS BORN IN PURLEY.UNTIL THE AGE OF 7 SHE HAD A GOVERNESS, THEN SHE WENT TO A PRIVATE GIRLS SCHOOL.LATER SHE WENT TO CROYDEN HIGH SCHOOL,A 2 MILE WALK.IT WAS VERY STRICT.GIRLS WERE CANED FOR TALKING.SHE BECAME A LIBRARIAN IN BOOTS THE CHEMIST.28 YEARS AGO SHE CAME TO LIVE IN HOOE, BECAUSE IT WAS SO PEACEFUL.2 YEARS AGO SHE CAME TO THE NURSING HOME.SHE LIKED TO SWIM AND DRIVE CARS AND GARDEN BUT IS NOW TOO OLD.SHE LIKES READING,ART, FLOWER-ARRANGING,WATCHING THE NEWS AND SITTING IN THE GARDEN WHEN ITS SUNNY. SHE HAS HER OWN ROOM WITH FURNITURE SHE BROUGHT WITH HER INCLUDING A TV AND TELEPHONE.SHE BELONGED TO THE WOMENS INSTITUTE,AND ALWAYS HAD A PET DOG OR CAT.SHE LIKES THE PEOPLE IN THE NURSING HOME BUT THE TRAFFIC IS NOISY AND SHE WOULD PREFER THE COUNTRYSIDE. SHE HAS VERY FEW VISITORS.
